name: Rem (Re:0)/蕾姆
description:
Trigger words : ph_rem, remhd, 1girl, blue hair, solo, blue eyes, x hair ornament,roswaal mansion maid uniform, maid

And if you want to change the outfit, delete ‘x hair ornament,roswaal mansion maid uniform, maid’ and change to the prompt word for the clothing you want to instead(as far as it exist in your ckpt)

Notice：As before, this lora was based on Meinaalter——https://civitai.com/models/20945/meinaalter

if your outputs are undesirable, try this ckpt or others high compatibility base model, because while the base model without some concepts of my trigger word, then the Ai can't draw them well. waiting for your comments and ❤ ※ (*>.<*)~

触发词：ph_rem, remhd, 1girl, blue hair, solo, blue eyes, x hair ornament,roswaal mansion maid uniform, maid

如果想要更换着装的话，删除‘x hair ornament,roswaal mansion maid uniform, maid’这几个提示词，然后更换成任何你想要的服装提示词就行了（前提是你的底模型里有这种服装）

如果效果不好，请使用Meinaalter、Anything或其它适应性强的底模型，因为当底模型缺少我训练用到的概念时会无法绘制出相同的结果。喜欢的话给个评论和点赞吧❤ ※ (*>.<*)~
